summary: A young girl and her father move into an old house haunted by the presence of a dead former resident and her beloved cat.
cast: Michael Ontkean|Elliot Page|Lori Hallier|Shirley Knight|Shawn Roberts|Mark Rendall|Tom Barnett|Nigel Bennett|Kelti MacMillan|Wade Lynch|Pam Stevenson|Baretta|Harley

title: Mrs. Ashboro's Cat
